org.hackystat.sensor.eclipse
Class VersionCheck

java.lang.Object
  org.hackystat.sensor.eclipse.VersionCheck

public class VersionCheck
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the version check function. Clients may call processUpdateDialog(String) to check new version on the server, whose url is specified in the preference page, and bring update info dialog if the new version is available. Supoorts for both 2x and 3x stream version information.

Author:
Hongbing Kou

Method Detail

createImageDescriptor

public ImageDescriptor createImageDescriptor(java.lang.String path)
Creates an image descriptor form the given path. The path should be the relative path from a project root.

Parameters:
path - the relative path from a project root.
Returns:
the newly created image descriptor.

processUpdateDialog

public void processUpdateDialog(java.lang.String updateUrl,
                                java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String[] messages)
Processes update dialog to the user. The current version and new version appear in the dialog. The element of the messages array is follows:
  • The element 0: first message.
  • The element 1: the message between local version and server version.
  • The element 2: last message.

Parameters:
updateUrl - the url for the update site, which ends with "site.xml".
title - the title to be shown in the update window page.
messages - the messages to be shown in the update window page.
